channel.title: Lots of questions
channel.description:
Hello my name is Vincent :cool: I am curently make a server not a client called scary scape Here are my questions.
1.Npc's not saving every time I log out of my server and put it offline and log back on all my npc's are gone can you please find a way to help me with this thank you. ;D
2.Making Npc's standing still when I respawn a Npc it will walk every where like its drunk is there anyway to make the Npc stand still so I can make a portal area with all of them all lined up thank you. :)
3.Quote changing when I log in it will have a scroll witch says like the Name of the server and the owner and also the news can you please help me to change it thanks. :cool:
4.Making commands like when you do something like this ~example~(::lunar,::ancient,::money,::starter) something like that Please help me with that thank you
5.Need help to make Npc's talk if you have the answer for that please post thank you!
6.Shop's Please tell me how to make shops and put items in there thank you!
7. Ugh im sorry if this is to much but I warned you! Making portals how do you make portals and teleport to coordinates like when the you go into a portal and it takes you to the place if you have the answer please reply thank you!
8.How can you make emote teleport buttons on the emote section when you teleport to the place when you click it and put the name on it if you know please reply!
9. final question how do you have a change character look option because you already get one when you log in to my server please help me if you have the answer please reply thank you!
And to finish it off il give you the server source im using if you have any others http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,336094.0.html which would suit my curiosity please reply! here it is

item.title: Lots of questions

item.description:
@vincentpet6 wrote:

Thanks I will try the character change thing out but the server is super blank so i may need to make one my self.

Read full topic

item.title: Lots of questions
item.dc:creator: @_Ryan3 _Ryan
item.description:
@_Ryan3 wrote:

1.) You must edit autospawn.cfg not just use the ::npc command
2.)Unless changed in client.java they should stay still
3.)Client.java
4.)Under your commands void. Not difficult at all
5.)npc.java
6.)Add them to wanneshops so they will open and edit shops.cfg
7.)Add the portal in makeGlobalObject and add something like

ifobject == ++++
X- ++++
Y- ++++

I Dont do portals much >.>
8.)Instead of emote == ++++ change it to something like a teleport
9.)Their should be some kind of ::char command if not just look for a redesign void.

Read full topic
